title: Ticket #6816: condor_event reader code does not put mem usage in terminate event ad
description:
the condor_event library that reads user event logs (used by Dagman and by the python bindings, as well as who-knows-what external tools) does not put Memory/Disk/etc resource request and usage information into the classad returned by the toClassAd() method. Nor does it read that information from the supplied classad in the initFromClassAd() method.

The python bindings JobEventLog class is affected by this bug, This bug also impacts the XML log reader/writer since it is built on top of these functions.

The various eventlog tests have not noticed this bug because they don't look for this information.
remarks:
2018-Nov-19 15:15:35 by tlmiller:
Code Review

Looks good to me.
